name: WPKN: Politics, Policy, and Planet Podcast

episodes.title: Opus Dei, Trump’s MAGA Movement and Pope Francis’ Catholic Church
episodes.description: Interview with Gareth Gore, a London-based investigative journalist and editor, conducted by Scott Harris. Gareth Gore talks about his new book, “Opus: The Cult of Dark Money, Human Trafficking, and Right-Wing Conspiracy inside the Catholic Church. He discusses the late Pope Francis’ views on Opus Dei, the conservative personal prelature within the Catholic Church, and the coming college of cardinals vote for his successor, as well as the rising influence of the political right-wing inside the U.S. Catholic Church.
